text:
### SCENE 48 – Kavya’s Incoming Proposal  

_Niha calls Arjun; he answers, stunned._

**Arjun:** Hello…  
**Niha:** **Kavya** vastundhi—actually *propose* cheyyadaniki…  
**Arjun:** Aa… _(shock)_  
**Niha:** Propose chesesindha?  
**Arjun:** Aa… _(still shock)_  
**Niha:** Em annav?  
**Arjun:** Aa…  
**Niha:** *Aa* annava, Arjun! _(shouts)_  
**Arjun:** Aa—cheppu.  
**Niha:** Na maata vinu, Arjun. *Move-on* avvadaniki idhe right time. Nuvvu **yes** cheppinantha matrana valla nanna emi tanaki US-ki tickets teesukoni pampincheydu—she’s such a sweet girl.  
**Arjun:** Enti *class peekutunnav*? Neetho pani ledhu—*pettey* inka…  
**Niha:** Rey, *durmarguda*!  
<!-- contains_profanity: mild | end Scene 48 -->

---
